biome_filters.title: Biome Filters
biome_filters.description: Specifies the biomes in which the Jigsaw Structure can generate.

step.title: Step
step.description: Specifies the world generation phase in which the structure is generated. This is used as a grouping concept to keep similar world-generation features generally bundled together.

terrain_adaptation.title: Terrain Adaptation
terrain_adaptation.description: How the terrain should adapt relative to the generated Jigsaw Structure.

max_depth.title: Max Depth
max_depth.description: The maximum recursion depth for Jigsaw Structure Generation. For example, a Jigsaw Structure that builds a road with a max_depth of 5 will only have paths that are a maximum of 5 structures templates in length in any given direction from the origin.

heightmap_projection.title: Heightmap Projection
heightmap_projection.description: Heightmap used to calculate the relative start height. For example, a heightmap_projection of ocean_floor and a start_height of 10 means the Jigsaw Structure will begin generating 10 blocks above the ocean floor.

dimensional_padding.title: Dimensional Padding
dimensional_padding.description: Specifies the padding for the top and bottom of the world.

max_distance_from_center.title: Max Distance From Center
max_distance_from_center.description: This is the max distance from the jigsaw pieces to the structure start-

start_height.title: Start Height
start_height.description: Height at which the Jigsaw Structure's start pool should begin.

start_jigsaw_name.title: Start Jigsaw Name
start_jigsaw_name.description: The start jigsaw name is the name of the jigsaw block from the start pool to be placed first.

pool_aliases.title: Pool Aliases
pool_aliases.description: Used to determine which template pool can be a substitute.

liquid_settings.title: Liquid Settings
liquid_settings.description: How to handle waterloggable blocks overlapping with existing liquid.
